AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Refresh Preview
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Refresh Graphical Preview from the Graph
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Request an image from Copilot to see a preview of the Multi-Agent Graph, based on the current configuration.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Retrieval
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enable knowledge retrieval from uploaded files
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Retrieval enables the assistant with knowledge from files that you or your users upload. Once a file is uploaded, the assistant automatically decides when to retrieve content based on user requests

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: APP Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name of the application.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The name of the assistant application linked to the role and webhook access.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ExternalID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: ID determined by external service depends on provider.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Reference only external identifier.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Add Copilot Tasks
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Add massive tasks for a Copilot Agent.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Select a zip/csv file to iterate over files/records and create a task for each one.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Chunk Overlap
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The number of tokens to overlap between chunks.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This parameter indicates the maximum number of tokens allowed in each chunk. The text will splitted in the next "double line break" after the max chunk size. If not specified, the default value is determined by the splitter.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Has Role Webhook
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the role has access to the webhook.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Shows whether the role has been granted access to the selected webhook. If unchecked, the permission is missing.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Copilot Schedule
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Copilot Schedule configuration.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Configure period in which the agent is runned.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line No.
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This column is the line number of messages in a Copilot chat.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This column helps maintain the order and spacing of messages, ensuring each message is uniquely identified within the chat.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sync Tool Structure
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Get a Tool's parameter information from its class
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This process will load the Description and the JSON Info fields of the tool. This data is get from the tool class. This information is used to create the parameters in the Assistant

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Temporal File
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Check to mark the file as temporal
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a file is marked as a temporal file, it will be deleted when the File Synchronization Process is run

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Defines the file via the location where it is placed.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The files can be of two types. Either remote files or attachments.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: OpenAI File ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: File record for Assistant to use
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The file that will be uploaded to the assistant and used as knowledge base

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sync Models
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Refresh the model list.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Refresh the model list, checking the models of the remote database.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tool Search Key
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The tool search key that identifies the tool.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The same name as the tool class must be used, this field is mandatory to find the tool in the 'Sync Tool Structure' process.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Title
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Title of current conversation.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This field has a global subject of tracked conversation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Prompt
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Prompt sended to assistant.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Reference only field to store message sended to assistant.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Role Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name of the role.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The name identifying the role associated with the webhook and assistant access.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Schedule Execution
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Schedule the execution of the tool
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This process will execute the tool based on the schedule defined

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: System App
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the Assistant is only for System Administrator
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The function of this check is to limit the use of certain Assistant to the system administrator and not to the end user.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Search Result Qty.
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Quantity of results brought up by the search in Knowledge Base.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Number of results brought by the search in Knowledge Base, this only applies when you have files indexed in the knowledge base. Being by default 4 results. This number should be increased with caution taking into account the model context window and the type and length used in the document splitting. For example, if the documents are split in chunks of few tokens, the number of results can be increased without exceeding the model context window.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Hql
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: HQL clause for Assistant context.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Adds an HQL statement to model the data to be sent. This HQL will be evaluated and its results will be exported in a .csv file.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Model
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Dropdown with the LLM models available
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If this field is empty, the 'Sync Assistant' process obtains the available models

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: App type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The type of Application being defined
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: There are two types of applications: * Langchain Agent: perform specific tasks in natural language * OpenAI Assistant: OpenAI technology. Self-trained with available knowledge base

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Member
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Link to the member of the Team.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Team members are apps (assistants) that are part of the work team.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Default Override
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Override the default selected model.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Unlike the “default” check that indicates the default model for the module, this check allows you to overwrite the preference for the Client. This check does not change with dataset updates and takes precedence over the other.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Code
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This field stores the search key for identification.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The search key is used as a unique identifier for quick referencing.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: App Team Member
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This record describes the relationship App -> Team Member.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This record links a Team with it members.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Role
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Role of messages in conversation.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This field has the role of which participant generate the message.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Max. tokens
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Define a maximum tokens quantity in model output.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Define a maximum tokens quantity in model output. This can be variable for each model.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Code Execution (Experimental)
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enables the assistant to write and run code.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This check enables the experimental feature of code execution in “Multi-model type” agents. For the case of “OpenAI type” agents, it activates the “Code Interpreter” functionality of the OpenAI API.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Prompt
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Specific instructions of the assistant.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Specific instructions of the assistant

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Etendo Maintained
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This field specifies if the record is maintained by Etendo.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Etendo maintained field defines whether the system automatically manages this record.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: ID of current message.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Record identifier of the message.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last Synchronization
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Read-only field displaying the date of the last update with OpenAI
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This field will be automatically updated each time an OpenAI update is performed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Agent
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Agent that will solve the question/request.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Agent that will solve the question/request when the execution of the task is made.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Skill/Tool
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Tool that will add functionality to copilot
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The tools available are the ones created in the 'Skill/Tool' window

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Openai Vectordb ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: OpenAI Vector Database Identifier
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: In case the application is of the OpenAI Assistant type, when synchronising it, an identifier is stored and used as a reference.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Time
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Time of track of the message.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Tracked time of the ocurrence of the message for reference only.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Check Hosts
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Check the hosting from Etendo to Copilot and back.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This process check if the ETENDO_HOST is available and if the response is 200. If so, checks the call to COPILOT_HOST verifying the 200 response, and then chek the call to Etendo again but using ETENDO_HOST_DOCKER.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: File Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name of the file.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: In case of downloading the file or generating it, the name will be this one.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Agent
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Agent that will solve the question/request.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Agent that will solve the question/request when the execution of the task is made.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exclude from Retrieval
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Exclude the item from the Retrieval Knowledge base
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Exclude the item from the Retrieval files, to avoid surpass the File limit.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Json Structure
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Contains a JSON description of the tool.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This field is automatically filled when the tool is synchronized.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tool Webhook
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Record which represents the relationship between a Skill/Tool and a Webhook.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This link allows to indicate which "Webhooks" are used by a Skill/Tool, to allow the synchronization processes to give the role access to use the Webhook if they are allowed to use an Assistant with this tool configured.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Temperature
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Temperature of the Assistant, value between 0 and 2
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
In the context of a Large Language Model (LLM) that is used by the assistant, "temperature" is a parameter that controls the randomness of the model's responses:
Low temperature (e.g., 0.1): Produces more predictable and conservative outputs. High temperature (e.g., 1.0 or higher): Produces more random and creative outputs.
Temperature adjusts the probability distribution for selecting the next word in a sequence, balancing between coherence and creativity.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Webhook Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name of the webhook.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The name used to identify the webhook associated with the assistant.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: OpenAI Assistant ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Read-only field in which the ID of the assistant is displayed once created
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Read-only field in which the ID of the assistant is displayed once created

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Conversation
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Conversation identifier
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Identifier of current tracked conversation

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Message text
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Message tracked in current conversation

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Skip Splitting
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the file division should be omitted when indexing it in the knowledge base.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates if the file division should be omitted when indexing it in the knowledge base. This prevents incomplete reading of files when searching the knowledge base. If the file is an archive, this setting applies to all the files it contains.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: File
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: File record for Assistant to use
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The file that will be uploaded to the assistant and used as knowledge base

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sync Status
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the synchronization status of the assistant. This column holds two possible values: 'synchronized' when the assistant is fully synchronized with the system, and 'pending synchronization' when the synchronization process is still incomplete or aw
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This column indicates the current status of the assistant. This field will not be modified manually; it changes to 'Pending Synchronization' when there is a modification or modifications in related groups (assistants, tools, knowledge files, team members, etc.). To change it to 'Synchronized,' it is necessary to synchronize the assistant using the 'Sync Assistant' button.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Alias
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Alias to replace with the content of the file.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: During the reading of the Assistant prompt, if an alias is specified, all occurrences of @alias@ will be replaced by the contents of the file. If not specified, it will be included at the end of the file.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Conversation
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Conversation ID of the assistant execution.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Unique value which this conversation is identified.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Behaviour
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Determine the behaviour of the file in the assistant.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The action determine in which moment the data is attached.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Etcop Role Webhookaccess V ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Unique identifier of the Role Webhook Access View record.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Technical identifier for internal reference, automatically generated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Max. Chunk Size
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The maximum size of chunks for splitting the text.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This parameter indicates the maximum number of tokens allowed in each chunk. The text will splitted in the next "double line break" after the max chunk size. If not specified, the default value is determined by the splitter.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last Message
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Last message Date.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date of the last message in the Conversation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Provider
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This field stores the name of the provider.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The provider field indicates the source or supplier associated with this model.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sync Assistant
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This process updates or creates a new assistant if it does not exist.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This process updates or creates a new assistant if it does not exist. It configures the wizard, updates the list of Open AI Models, and uploads files used as a knowledge base.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Assistant
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Assistant.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Assistants can answer queries or perform tasks according to your configuration.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Graph Preview
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Graphical preview from the LangGraph
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Graphical preview of the multi-agent graph. It indicates with a solid line the mandatory paths and with a dotted line the optional paths.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exclude from Code Interpreter
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Exclude the item from the Code interpreter Knowledge base
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Exclude the item from the Code interpreter files, to avoid surpass the File limit.
